attributes.action: Should local councils be allowed to change the payment date of council tax?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My local council, Trafford MBC has decided to change the 10 monthly payment dates from the 15th of each month to the 1st of each month. I am asking should they be allowed to do this without a public consultation? I say they should leave it as it is because we have been used to paying on the 15th for well over 15 years.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
